document.title: Code Document Object Model (CodeDom)
document.paragraph:
CodeDom is a Microsoft .NET technology which allows representing source code programatically so that it may be rendered in different languages. The Eiffel CodeDom Provider is installed through the ASP.NET Enabler which is available for download for free on the Eiffel Software web site (
http://www.eiffel.com http://www.eiffel.com _blank ). The following documents cover different aspects of the Eiffel CodeDom Provider:
The
enabler/index.xml ASP.NET Enabler documentation covers topics related to writting Eiffel pages in ASP.NET.
The
codedom/index.xml Eiffel CodeDom Provider documentation focuses on the Eiffel CodeDom Provider per se. Read this documentation if you intend on using the Eiffel CodeDom Provider via a different mean than ASP.NET (e.g. to generate Web Services stubs using Microsoft's WSDL utility).
Finally, the
tools/index.xml Tools documentation covers both the Eiffel CodeDom Provider Manager and eSplitter tools.
